roleset.name: cause to form a nucleus
roleset.note: NUCLEATE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in medical data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from nucleate.01-v)

role.descr: Causer of nuclei formation (rare, only for explicit creation)

example.name: When arg 0 is ok
example.text: Historically, It was a common practice for a city planner to nucleate a village by clustering houses around a church.
